channel.title: Gits on Barlowe Analytics
channel.description: Recent content in Gits on Barlowe Analytics

item.title: Introduction to Git and Github
item.description: by Matthew Barlowe So if you’ve started out doing a little coding either for fun or like me to try and do data analysis of the NHL, then you’ve probably heard people talk a lot about Git and Github. And if you were like me, you’ve even tried to learn it, or use it, but just got so frustrated you gave up and figured it wasn’t worth the time.
